price: 109. Mpe landa maye makiteli yo, mpe kanga motema kino Allah akosambisa; mpo ye azali zuzi malamu wa ba zuzi.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka wa-iṣ'bir ḥattā yaḥkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
